#comment: The following are CMOR internal settings and should not be edited by the user
comment: Grid cells corresponding to glacier, mountain, water, or no_data in the source product are set to missing (NaN). A value of 0 indicates no snow.

NERC EDS Centre for Environmental Data Analysis.
title: CCI SWE v4.0
variant_info: obs4MIPs-compliant SWE product prepared by FMI
